bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.data

Class FeatureForACategory

  • java.lang.Object
    • bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.carto.data.FeatureForACategory

  • public class FeatureForACategory
extends Object
    This class stores all the features matching a particular category.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Constructor Detail

      • FeatureForACategory

        public FeatureForACategory(double factor)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        factor - the sequence to pixel conversion factor.

      • FeatureForACategory

        public FeatureForACategory(String catName,
                   double factor)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        catName - the category name.
        factor - the sequence to pixel conversion factor.

      • FeatureForACategory

        public FeatureForACategory(String catName,
                   double factor,
                   boolean forceOneLanePerCategory)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        catName - the category name.
        factor - the sequence to pixel conversion factor.
        forceOneLanePerCategory - if true then all features will be added to a unique lane. Otherwise, as soon as a lane contains spanning features, they will be added to separate lanes.
